oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Job advisor Mrs. Elizabeth Gregg MacGibbon, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published photo of Mrs. Elizabeth Gregg MacGibbon from the Nashville Times (1940), the head caption reads “Job Advisor.” Mrs. MacGibbon was known as the “Emily Post of Business.” In addition to being an automobile editor, an advertising manager, and other entrepreneurial positions, she lectured, toured the country presenting “playlets” in department stores, and wrote a syndicated column. MacGibbon is the author of the 1947 book “Fitting Yourself for Business.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: MacGibbon, Elizabeth Gregg
